mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: Restaurant and retail POS system offering customizable features, wide range of hardware options, and third-party app integrations. Competed on flexibility and accepting more payment options than Toast, with no contract requirements.

mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: Major competitor with 6.21% market share. Offers customizable POS experience with wide range of hardware options, third-party apps, and integrations. Accepts more payment options than Toast and provides contract-free flexibility.

mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: Flexible POS system with 6.21% market share. Accepts more payment options than Toast with customizable features and wide range of hardware options. Custom-build capability with extensive third-party apps and integrations. No contract requirements unlike Toast.
